Grammar:   DataElement 6.0
Namespace: shr.test

Entry:   BooleanConstraintOnValue
Description:    "It is an entry with a boolean constraint on the value"
Value:          boolean = true

Entry:   BooleanConstraintOnValueChild
Description:    "It is an entry with a boolean constraint on the value's child"
Value:          SimpleBoolean
                SimpleBoolean.boolean = false

Entry:   BooleanConstraintOnFieldChild
Description:    "It is a group entry with a boolean constraint on a field's child"
Property:       Simple 0..1
Property:       SimpleBoolean 0..1 
                SimpleBoolean.boolean is true

Element:        SimpleBoolean
Value:          boolean

Element:        Simple
Value:          string
